description: Fixed SST ERF simulation. Use pre-industrial climatological average SST and sea-ice distributions. Apply pre-industrial concentrations of WMGHG (well mixed greenhouse gases) pre-industrial emissions of NTCF (near-term climate forcers). This is a timeslice experiment of 30 years total.  Provided this experiment is run with the same interactive chemistry and aerosols, this will be the same as the RFMIP piClim-control experiment.
keywords: AerChemMIP, Tier 1, piControl, pre-industrial control, 1850 SST, 1850 WMGHG, 1850 NTCF, near term climate forcers
rationale: To compute the ERF for 1850 and 2014.

requirements.description: Idealised temporal constraint, repeating 1850 for 30 years
requirements.label: 1850-1851 30yrs

requirements.description: Impose pre-industrial (1850) non-chemically reactive Well Mixed Greenhouse Gas (WMGHG) concentrations.  No methane, nitrous oxide or halocarbons.
requirements.keywords: Pre-industrial, 1850, Well Mixed Greenhouse Gas, WMGHG, non-chemically reactive
requirements.label: 1850 Non-Reactive WMGHG Concentrations

requirements.description: Impose 1850 emissions of Near Term Climate Forcers (NTCF): namely tropospheric aerosols and tropospheric ozone precursors.
requirements.keywords: 1850, Near Term Climate Forcers, NTCF, emissions
requirements.label: 1850 NTCF Emissions

requirements.description: Impose pre-industrial (1850) concentrations of Ozone depleating Halocarbons (CFC/HCFC).
requirements.keywords: pre-industrial, 1850, halocarbons, ODS, ozone depleting substances, CFCs, HCFCs
requirements.label: 1850 Ozone Depleting Halocarbon Concentrations

requirements.description: Pre-Industrial sea surface temperature from the piControl experiment
requirements.keywords: pre-industrial control, SST, sea surface temperature
requirements.label: PIControlSST

requirements.description: Pre-Industrial sea ice concentration from the piControl experiment.
requirements.keywords: pre-industrial control, SIC, sea ice, sea ice concentration
requirements.label: PIControl SIC

requirements.description: Impose 1850 emissions of Near Term Climate Forcers (NTCF): namely tropospheric aerosols and tropospheric ozone precursors.
requirements.keywords: Pre-industrial forcing, NTCF, near term climate forcers
requirements.label: 1850 NTCF Emissions

requirements.description: Use an Atmosphere general circulation model with interactive aerosols.
requirements.keywords: AGCM, Aerosols, AGCM-Aer, Atmosphere General Circulation Model, interactive aerosols
requirements.label: AGCM-Aer Configuration
